entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
